Description: Large 3 Bedroom apartment with beautifully renovated kitchen and bathroom located in Jamaica Plain's Hyde Square, with outdoor space! Just a short walk to neighborhood bars/ restaurants, and just a 4 minute (0.2 mile) walk to the Whole Foods on Centre Street. The area offers tons of street parking and easy access to public transportation- great location for Downtown or Longwood commuters. Don't miss out on this great deal!!
